波乱注意砲！.englishDescription: From the middle of the race slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt

アクセルX.englishDescription: Increase speed and power lightly when close to the lead in last 200m

レッドエース.englishDescription: Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to gain slightly more power to help you stay in 1st place

精神一到.englishDescription: Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.

熱血☆アミーゴ.englishDescription: Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight

エンプレス・プライド.englishDescription: Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in last corner

勝利のキッス☆.englishDescription: Slightly easier to break away when competing in the last corner

燃えろ筋肉！.englishDescription: Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race

introduction：My body.englishDescription: Lightly recover stamina in the second half of the race by holding yourself back during corners

全力Vサインッ！.englishDescription: On the final straight your desire not to lose, increases your speed lightly

学級委員長+速さ＝バクシン.englishDescription: While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power

クリアハート.englishDescription: Be in a good position during the middle stage of the race to lightly recover your endurance

ワクワクよーいドン.englishDescription: Being at the back during the last corner, lightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl

来てください来てください！.englishDescription: If during the last leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it lightly easier to spot an opening

アタシもたまには、ね？.englishName: You know, sometimes even I can…
アタシもたまには、ね？.englishDescription: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed

Call me KING.englishDescription: If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m

シューティングスター.englishDescription: Overtake the opponent in front of you during the last leg of the race to gain momentum and increase your speed

先頭の景色は譲らない…！.englishName: I'm not giving up the lead…!

究極テイオーステップ.englishDescription: Close down the leader on the final straight to greatly increase your speed even further through your brilliant leg work

紅焔ギア/LP1211-M.englishDescription: Be close to the leader at the final corner to increase your acceleration by changing gears

煌星のヴォードヴィル.englishDescription: If you're in front at the final straight and manage to break out a little, increase speed greatly

勝利の鼓動.englishDescription: Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field

不沈艦、抜錨ォッ！.englishDescription: Gradually increase speed during the long spurt in Middle Leg

カッティング×DRIVE！.englishDescription: Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m

ブリリアント・レッドエース.englishDescription: Display your power in keeping the lead position during the latter half of the race

ヴィクトリーショット！.englishDescription: Be in a good position at the last corner to gain momentum and increase your acceleration

精神一到何事か成らざらん.englishName: Where there's a will, there's a way
精神一到何事か成らざらん.englishDescription: Increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight

タイマン！デッドヒート！.englishDescription: On the last straight, gain speed when passing from the outside back

貴顕の使命を果たすべく.englishDescription: Be close to the lead in the final corner to gain speed as you resolve yourself to not be overtaken

プランチャ☆ガナドール.englishDescription: Easier to keep a good position in last straight with spare energy

ヴィットーリアに捧ぐ舞踏.englishDescription: Fight for the lead at the last corner to increase your speed through your kingly radiance

Shadow Break.englishDescription: Increase speed with monstrous power from the final corner onward when passing from the outside

汝、皇帝の神威を見よ.englishName: Thou, witness the heavenly might of the Emperor

ブレイズ・オブ・プライド.englishDescription: Increase speed when passing in the back in last corner

尊み☆ﾗｽﾄｽﾊﾟ—(ﾟ∀ﾟ)—ﾄ!.englishDescription: If you overtake others at least twice at the end of the race, your speed will increase

アングリング×スキーミング.englishDescription: During the last corner, gain acceleration when in the first position

∴win Q.E.D..englishDescription: Increase speed when passing in the front of the last corner

ひらめき☆ランディング.englishDescription: After a struggle for the lead on the last corner, it becomes easier to break away during the final straight

アナタヲ・オイカケテ.englishDescription: If you're in the middle of the pack in the second half of the race, your speed will increase while draining the speed of the girls ahead of you

G00 1st.F∞;.englishDescription: Lead by yourself without letting up until the final straight to increase your speed

レッツ・アナボリック！.englishDescription: Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake in last corner

I'M☆FULL☆SPEED!!.englishDescription: If you get a little tired while being in a good position in the middle of the race, your speed and acceleration increase

ブルーローズチェイサー.englishDescription: Break away on the last straight to steel your will and increase your speed

U=ma2.englishDescription: When being held back on corners of the later half of the race, your endurance recovers

勝利のチケットを、君にッ！.englishName: The ticket to victory, for you!

Schwarzes Schwert.englishDescription: If you manage to keep your composure until the final straight, your speed will increase

#LookatCurren.englishDescription: Gain momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the middle leg

姫たるもの、勝利をこの手に.englishDescription: If you struggle for victory on the last straight from the middle of the pack, your speed will increase

KEEP IT REAL..englishDescription: In the second half of the race, increase acceleration if you start overtaking from the middle of the pack

優等生×バクシン＝大勝利ッ.englishName: Honor Student x Bakushin = Big Victory

ピュリティオブハート.englishDescription: Be in good position in Middle Leg to recover endurance

キラキラ☆STARDOM.englishDescription: Increase your momentum during the middle leg's straight with the feeling of keeping the lead from being overtaken

YEAH☆VIVID TIME!.englishDescription: If you overtake or are about to be overtaken by someone else on the final straight while in a good position, your speed will increase

Nemesis.englishDescription: Increase speed in the last corner when coming up from the back of the pack

ワクワククライマックス.englishDescription: When in the back in last corner, restore your endurance when you see another horse girl

来ます来てます来させます！.englishName: I'm coming, I'm coming, I'm coming!

I Never Goof Up!.englishDescription: During the last leg, if you overtake from the middle of the pack during a corner, increase speed and acceleration

きっとその先へ…！.englishDescription: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases

絶対は、ボクだ.englishDescription: Increase speed in the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead

グッときて♪Chu.englishDescription: In the second half of the race, increase speed when you recover endurance with your skills while being in front

最強の名を懸けて.englishDescription: Increase speed after the last corner when stamina runs out being one of the lead

コンドル猛撃波.englishDescription: During the last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle of the pack

翳り退く、さざめきの矢.englishDescription: If you're about to be overtaken at the front after the final corner, your speed will increase

フラワリー☆マニューバ.englishDescription: During the last corner, increase speed if passing in the front; increase acceleration if passing in the back

ライトニングステップ.englishDescription: Medium・Become harder to box in if behind in Middle Leg

イナズマステップ.englishDescription: Medium・Become lightly harder to box in if behind in Middle Leg

神業ステップ.englishDescription: Medium・Become harder to tire out from left-right movements

軽やかステップ.englishDescription: Medium・Become slightly harder to tire out from left-right movements

独占力.englishDescription: Medium・Slows down girls in the front if you're behind in Final Leg

束縛.englishDescription: Medium・Slightly slows down girls in the front if you're behind in Final Leg

魅惑のささやき.englishDescription: Medium・Confuses the girl right in front of you in Middle Leg

ささやき.englishDescription: Medium・Slightly confuses the girl right in front of you in Middle Leg

先陣の心得.englishDescription: Long・Easier to keep the lead if you lead with big margin in the Middle Leg

リードキープ.englishDescription: Long・Slightly easier to keep the lead if you lead with big margin in the Middle Leg

パス上手.englishDescription: Long・Become slightly harder to tire when passing

怒涛の追い上げ.englishDescription: Long・Increases speed when passing in the Final Leg

追い上げ.englishDescription: Long・Slightly increases speed when passing in the Final Leg

スタミナグリード.englishDescription: Long・Steal a bit of stamina from girls in the front when behind in Middle Leg

スタミナイーター.englishDescription: Long・Slightly steal stamina of girls in the front when behind in Middle Leg

奇術師.englishDescription: Long・Narrows the field of vision of girls in the front in Final Leg

目くらまし.englishDescription: Long・Lightly narrows the field of vision of girls in the front in Final Leg

シックスセンス.englishDescription: Runner・Become harder to box in during Opening Leg

危険回避.englishDescription: Runner・Become a bit harder to surround in Opening Leg

先頭プライド.englishDescription: Runner・Become slightly harder to pass in the Opening Leg

じゃじゃウマ娘.englishDescription: Runner・Become harder to tire out on uphills

勢い任せ.englishDescription: Runner・Become slightly harder to tire out on uphills

再燃焼.englishDescription: Runner・Increases acceleration when behind in Middle Leg

二の矢.englishDescription: Runner・Slightly increases acceleration behind in Middle Leg

リスタート.englishDescription: Runner・When failing to take the lead during the Opening Leg, girls in front will become flustered

技巧派.englishDescription: Leader・Taking position becomes a bit smoother

巧みなステップ.englishDescription: Leader・Taking position becomes very slightly smoother

決意の直滑降.englishDescription: Leader・Become a bit better at downhills

栄養補給.englishDescription: Leader・Slightly recover stamina in Middle Leg

くじけぬ精神.englishDescription: Leader・Lightly increases acceleration when behind in Middle Leg

まき直し.englishDescription: Leader・Slightly increases acceleration when behind in Middle Leg

幻惑のかく乱.englishDescription: Leader・Lightly narrows the field of vision of girls in the back when in front in Final Leg

かく乱.englishDescription: Leader・Slightly narrows the field of view of girls in the back when in Front in Final Leg

努力家.englishDescription: Betweener・Passing becomes a bit easier to succeed

がんばり屋.englishDescription: Betweener・Passing becomes slightly easier to succeed

リラックス.englishDescription: Betweener・Recover stamina during the Final Leg

小休憩.englishDescription: Betweener・Slightly recover stamina during the Final Leg

大局観.englishDescription: Betweener・Sharpens observation skills in Middle Leg, widening field of vision a little

読解力.englishDescription: Betweener・Slightly sharpens observation skills during the Middle Leg, widening field of vision a little

八方にらみ.englishDescription: Betweener・Flusters other girls in Final Leg

鋭い眼光.englishDescription: Betweener・Slightly flusters other girls during in Final Leg

お見通し.englishDescription: Chaser・Grasp the situation when moving left-right, slightly widening field of vision

下校後のスペシャリスト.englishDescription: Chaser・Become harder to tire out on downhills

下校の楽しみ.englishDescription: Chaser・Become slightly harder to tire out on downhills

冷静沈着.englishDescription: Chaser・When front is crowded, calm down and remain composed

冷静.englishDescription: Chaser・When front is crowded, slightly calm down remain composed

天命士.englishDescription: Chaser・Widens field of vision when behind in Final Leg

策士.englishDescription: Chaser・Slightly widens field of vision when behind in Final Leg

熱いまなざし.englishDescription: Chaser・Unnerve girls you set your sights on in Final Leg

まなざし.englishDescription: Chaser・Slightly unnerve girls you set your sights on in the Final Leg

逃げのコツ◎.englishDescription: Runner・Taking a good position becomes easier

逃げのコツ○.englishDescription: Runner・Taking a good position becomes a little easier

先行のコツ○.englishDescription: Leader・Taking a good position becomes a little easier

ラッキーセブン.englishDescription: A little good thing may happen if your starting gate is 7

スリーセブン.englishDescription: Slightly improve mood when the remaining distance is 777m

ウマ好み.englishDescription: Slightly increase speed when many girls are nearby

ウママニア.englishDescription: When there are many other horse girls nearby, your speed will increase

地固め.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration when many skills are activated during the Opening Leg

ふり絞り.englishDescription: Slightly recover stamina if many skills activate during the Final Leg

シンパシー.englishDescription: Increases ability a little if there are many girls with Sympathetic Heart

一匹狼.englishDescription: Raises your abilities a little if you're the only girl with Lone Wolf's Heart

スリップストリーム.englishDescription: When following right behind a girl, become slightly less affected by wind resistance

遊びはおしまいっ！.englishDescription: Slightly increase speed when a girl has been following you for a while

レコメンド.englishDescription: Dirt・slightly increase your speed during the middle leg when competing for position

静かな呼吸.englishDescription: Betweener・In the second half of the Opening Leg, your endurance will slightly recover

凸凹ネイル.englishDescription: Become a little worse on tracks in Good condition

アオハル点火・速.englishDescription: During the Middle Leg, the higher the total speed of your team, the more your speed increases

アオハル点火・体.englishDescription: During the Middle Leg, the higher the total stamina of your team, the more your stamina recovers

アオハル点火・力.englishDescription: During the Final Leg, the higher the total power of your team, the more your acceleration increases

アオハル点火・根.englishDescription: During the Final Leg, the higher the total guts of your team, the more your speed and acceleration increase

アオハル点火・賢.englishDescription: During the Opening Leg, the higher the total wisdom of your team, the better your positioning becomes
